item.title: Ideation as a Muscle: Training Your Mind to Generate Great Ideas
item.description: Understanding Our Goals, Developing a Process, and Trusting the Journey “A company that’s likely to make a substantial change in the status quo … is thinking about a problem or a customer need in a way you’ve never heard before, but which makes perfect sense once you hear it." —Tony Fadell, Build Why: Understand Our Goal for Ideation Ideation is a muscle that we must train, similar to how we exercise our bodies to become stronger and healthier.
